title: Forces make forms
creator_credit: Harry Robin, Peter Wright, FilmFair Communications and Kinex productions
brief_description: Unusual and everyday objects and events are used to encourage critical observation and logical association between forces in operation and their resultant forms. Examples of both natural and man-made forces and the forms they create are designed to assist students to become aware of their visual environment. Suitable for upper secondary level.
